sentences.en: Boldwood had been indiscriminate in his invitations.
sentences.cn: 博尔德伍德的这次招待是来者不拒的.

sentences.en: But it is not the indiscriminate applause of a Pollyanna.
sentences.cn: 但这绝对不是在做烂好人.

sentences.en: His great power seemed to be his power of indiscriminate admiration.
sentences.cn: 他最大的本领似乎是对人胡吹乱捧.

sentences.en: indiscriminate attacks on motorists by youths throwing stones
sentences.cn: 年轻人乱扔石头袭击驾车的人

sentences.en: Indiscriminate borrowing and lending is what got us into this mess.
sentences.cn: 不加选择地借贷造成了目前这种混乱局面.

sentences.en: Indiscriminate felling of trees will destroy the ecological balance of nature.
sentences.cn: 乱砍乱伐会破坏整个自然环境的生态平衡.

sentences.en: It isn't just indiscriminate bank lending that has retarded moves toward rebalancing.
sentences.cn: 并不只有银行不加甄别地借贷阻碍经济的重新平衡.

sentences.en: My brother is indiscriminate in collecting stamps.
sentences.cn: 我的弟弟不加选择地乱集邮票.

sentences.en: Or is an indiscriminate maniac stalking the world's bourses?
sentences.cn: 还是一场蔓延在世界金融市场中的疯狂?

sentences.en: Perhaps because Mumbai stands for lucre, profane dreams and an indiscriminate openness.
sentences.cn: 也许是因为孟买主张财富 、 世俗的梦想和对外一视同仁的开放.

sentences.en: She disapproved of her son's indiscriminate television viewing.
sentences.cn: 她不赞成儿子不加选择地收看电视.

sentences.en: The advantage of rain is that it is massive and indiscriminate.
sentences.cn: 雨水的优势是量大而且随意.

sentences.en: the indiscriminate use of chemical fertilizers
The indiscriminate use of fertilisers is damaging to the environment.
The indiscriminate use of fertilizers is damaging to the environment.
sentences.cn: 化肥的滥用化正在损害环境。

sentences.en: The market's aversion to banking risk is perhaps indiscriminate.
sentences.cn: 市场对银行业风险的嫌恶或许不分青红皂白.

sentences.en: Wood is indiscriminate in his choice of friends as well as enemies.
sentences.cn: 伍德不论选择朋友还是敌人都是随随便便,来者不拒.

words.tran_cn: 任意的；无差别的；不分皂白的

trans.tran_cn: 不加选择的，不分青红皂白的，随意的，任性的，任意的，眼内无珠，汗漫不可收拾
trans.tran_en: an indiscriminate action is done without thinking about what harm it might cause
